bn:00090041v: To protect; to keep from harm or injury.
Maintain in safety from injury, harm, or danger
To keep safe; to defend; to guard; to prevent harm coming to.
To keep something or someone safe or prevent harm coming to someone or something.
To protect from danger; to secure against surprise, attack, or injury; to keep in safety; to defend.

An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

apple_vendor_description: The man guard emoji on Apple devices presents a distinguished figure with a light skin tone, clad in a crisp, dark uniform. Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading adds a polished sheen to his meticulously rendered attire, complete with a prominent, stylized hat that speaks of authority and tradition.  His neutral, steady gaze, characteristic of Apple‚Äôs expressive emoji faces, conveys a sense of duty and unwavering vigilance, making him perfect for symbolizing security, protection, or official presence in digital conversations.
